channel.title: SwagScapePK317 -Eco Spawn-
channel.description:
Welcome to SwagScape! #317 Revision!
~[URL=http://superswagscape.com/playnow2.html]PLAY[/URL]~ ~[URL=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/54321053/client.jar]DOWNLOAD[/URL]~ ~[URL=http://swagg.smffy.com]FORUMS[/URL]~
SwagScape is currently a Spawn PlayerKilling Economy. You can spawn some items, but not all of them, Some require PkP, Quests, or Donator benefits(Very few so don't worry if you can't donate, but it helps :D. ) You can set your Melee only stats using the skill tab, by clicking and inputing what level you would like.
Lets get on to some features, shall we?
~Skills~
Agility: >One course, but functional. Herblore: >Ability to create multiple potions, including Extremes+Ovl's. Thieving: >All Original Thieving NPC's world-wide. >All Stalls. Crafting: >Gem Cutting. >Leather && D'hide making. Fletching: >Shafts. >Bows, Longbows, Semi-Crossbows Slayer: >Duradel will assign you monsters based on your combat level >The command "::task" will teleport you STRAIGHT to that monster. >SlayerPoints. RuneCrafting: >All runes >Both Pure and Rune Essence >Tiaras, Talismans, AND pouches :D Mining: >Worldwide rocks. >Prospecting. Smithing: >All furnaces, Anvils, Everything is functionable, no d/cs. Fishing: >Small net, Big net, Fly fishing, Bait fishing. Cooking: >All meat, fish, winery, stews, potatoes. Firemaking: >Fully clipped. Woodcutting: >All trees. Farming & Hunter & Summoning. >Workin on it :p
~Combat Aspects~ Re-written Defence system, Melee, magic, and ranged systems, Alot better.
~Quests~ Currently one quest. The Ritual Vid ->
*Credits go to MyQuests of R-S, for posting how to add it. none to me.*
~MiniGames~
80% Barrows (No tunnels, thats all.) 100% Pest Control 100% Fight Caves 100% Duel Arena 30% Warrior Guild (Just a base, Armour animating and Cyclops.)
~Boss's~
>Jad >Giant Mole >Khalphite Queen >All Godwars >Nex >KBD >Dags >TD's >Corp
~Extra Info~
100% Clan Chats, OLD 289 Gameframe, Oldschool look with newschool vibe, all wrapped up in SwagScape :D, PM'ing, Dicing, FunPK, PVP Zones. Thanks for reading, We hope to see you soon! - PavSwag.

item.title: SwagScapePK317 -Eco Spawn-
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

OMG a server where you can pk! in the wilderness even!!!
Um, where else would you PK? :| I'm with Fridder on this one. The client background makes we want to regurgitate over and over again. You totally ruined the old-school gameframe with the sprites, and such. If you want my honest opinion, I would delete this thread, disappear for a year or two, come back, and try again. This server is going nowhere. Sorry, mate.

On a side note, the “S.M.D” makes you seem childish beyond belief. Advertisements are meant to draw people in, not scare them away.

Read full topic

item.title: SwagScapePK317 -Eco Spawn-
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

You’re that ‘Pavswag’ moron… Stop. The name is stupid and if you’re trying to be funny about it, it’s not funny. It makes you look so fucking bad…

That client background is really ugly, you should make a new one. A gameframe like that does not look appealing whatsoever with items/models/sprites like those.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I was going to say “doesn’t look that bad” for a second, but then I mentioned the word swag and decided to get my gun instead.

Read full topic

item.title: SwagScapePK317 -Eco Spawn-
item.dc:creator: @SwagScape317 SwagScape317
item.description:
@SwagScape317 wrote:

Welcome to SwagScape! #317 Revision!

~PLAY~ ~DOWNLOAD~ ~FORUMS~

SwagScape is currently a Spawn PlayerKilling Economy. You can spawn some items, but not all of them, Some require PkP, Quests, or Donator benefits(Very few so don’t worry if you can’t donate, but it helps :D. ) You can set your Melee only stats using the skill tab, by clicking and inputing what level you would like.

Lets get on to some features, shall we?

~Skills~

Agility:

One course, but functional.
Herblore:
Ability to create multiple potions, including Extremes+Ovl’s.
Thieving:
All Original Thieving NPC’s world-wide.
All Stalls.
Crafting:
Gem Cutting.
Leather && D’hide making.
Fletching:
Shafts.
Bows, Longbows, Semi-Crossbows
Slayer:
Duradel will assign you monsters based on your combat level
The command “::task” will teleport you STRAIGHT to that monster.
SlayerPoints.
RuneCrafting:
All runes
Both Pure and Rune Essence
Tiaras, Talismans, AND pouches
Mining:
Worldwide rocks.
Prospecting.
Smithing:
All furnaces, Anvils, Everything is functionable, no d/cs.
Fishing:
Small net, Big net, Fly fishing, Bait fishing.
Cooking:
All meat, fish, winery, stews, potatoes.
Firemaking:
Fully clipped.
Woodcutting:
All trees.
Farming & Hunter & Summoning.
Workin on it

~Combat Aspects~
Re-written Defence system, Melee, magic, and ranged systems, Alot better.

~Quests~
Currently one quest.
The Ritual
Vid ->

Credits go to MyQuests of R-S, for posting how to add it. none to me.

~MiniGames~

80% Barrows (No tunnels, thats all.)
100% Pest Control
100% Fight Caves
100% Duel Arena
30% Warrior Guild (Just a base, Armour animating and Cyclops.)

~Boss’s~

Jad
Giant Mole
Khalphite Queen
All Godwars
Nex
KBD
Dags
TD’s
Corp

~Extra Info~

100% Clan Chats, OLD 289 Gameframe, Oldschool look with newschool vibe, all wrapped up in SwagScape :D, PM’ing, Dicing, FunPK, PVP Zones. Thanks for reading, We hope to see you soon! - PavSwag.
